t: Amazon is opening a clothing store next to Nordstrom and JC Penney | CNN Business
s: January 20, 2022 - Amazon (AMZN) announced Thursday that it will open Amazon (AMZN) Style, its first clothing, shoe and accessories’ store later this year at a posh shopping complex in Los Angeles. The 30,000-square-foot store’s next door neighbors will be some of the traditional clothing and department stores ...

t: Amazon Style RIP
s: Amazon will be shutting its Amazon Style store at the Americana at Brand in Glendale on Thursday, bringing one of its experiments in brick-and-mortar retail to a close.
